description: The general form of the recurrences are the a(j), b(j) and n(j) solutions of the 2 equations problem: 11*n(j) + 1 = a(j)*a(j) and 13*n(j) + 1 = b(j)*b(j) with positive integer elements. the solutions of the 2 equations problem: 11*n(j) + 1 = a(j)*a(j); 13*n(j) + 1 = b(j)*b(j); with integer numbers.
